document_data.mainbody: ist of words in the [[Gnome language]].
document_data.C:
;''cosim camman denoctusd''
: "the settled ground before the earthquake", which in the [[Common]] tongue would be close to the phrase, "the calm before the storm".
document_data.F:
;''forstneblin''
:"[[forest gnome]]"<ref>Andrew Turpin and Nathan E. Irving (August 1999). "[[Bazaar of the Bizarre]]: Magic of the Wee Folk". In [[Dave Gross]] ed. [[Dragon magazine 262|Dragon #262]] ([[TSR, Inc.]]), p. 65
document_data.G:
;''Gond'ral thra'kazhul nesh''
:"May Gond be with you."
document_data.H:
;''harnor''
:"[[monstrous spider]]"; plural is ''harnorl''{{Cite web/theedverse/2022-01-08 - The Word for Spider Across Languages}}
document_data.P:
;''praed''
: "male homosexual" (slang){{Cite web/Candlekeep forum/Questions for Ed Greenwood (2005)/02-16/Lexicon for Orientations & Preferences}}
document_data.S:
;''steinneblin''
: "[[rock gnome]]"{{Cite dragon/262/Bazaar of the Bizarre: Magic of the Wee Folk|62}}
;''storgin''
: "[[stone-eater]]"<ref>[[Douglas Niles]] and [[Michael Dobson]] (1986). ''[[The Mines of Bloodstone]]''. ([[TSR, Inc]]), p. 48. ISBN [[Special:BookSources/0-8803-8312-7|0-8803-8312-7]].
;''svirfneblin''
: "[[deep gnome]]"
document_data.T:
; ''thoulal''
: "transgender"{{Cite web/theedverse/2021-08-29 - How Demihuman Languages Refer to Transgender}}
